channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description:
Just checking out how the NYT got this nice-looking presentation style to work on Twitter. https://t.co/inZFbbznCa

that format is being rendered by twitter. it's not part of the image. i looked at the twitter: metadata in the <head> section of the html, and it looks pretty ordinary. but my articles don't look like this when i paste their urls into twitter or do they? hmm.

my guess is they're doing something special for the nyt.

Apparently only some people see the new style of presentation. Here's a screen shot for those who can't see it. https://t.co/Pk0T2PT6pw
item.source:markdown:
Just checking out how the NYT got this nice-looking presentation style to work on Twitter. https://t.co/inZFbbznCa
that format is being rendered by twitter. it's not part of the image. i looked at the twitter: metadata in the <head> section of the html, and it looks pretty ordinary. but my articles don't look like this when i paste their urls into twitter or do they? hmm.
my guess is they're doing something special for the nyt.
Apparently only some people see the new style of presentation. Here's a screen shot for those who can't see it. https://t.co/Pk0T2PT6pw

item.description:
Articles like this make me nauseous because there's too much horse-racing for me to factor out easily.

The idea that this is news comes from someone or a group of people who are lazy thinkers. https://t.co/XYiWOLxzlY
item.source:markdown:

item.description:
Trump. Give them what trump won't. Change the conversation from one about trump that he controls to one that is focused on his boredom, sloth, immaturity, depravity, bad hygiene, criminal behavior and

shitloads of lying. Introduce new characters, like his cardiologist.

item.description:
All the michegas over trump boils down to one thing. He's a fucking TV show. And his ratings these days are pretty bad.

If you want to really bury him once and for all, program a Trump TV show every night that isn't news, it's actors in a soap opera, playing the roles of

item.description:
1. They genuinely listen.
  2. They stand up for people who are being hunted.
  3. They read posts before responding to them.
item.source:markdown: 10. They genuinely listen. 11. They stand up for people who are being hunted. 12. They read posts before responding to them.

item.description:
What do nice Internet users do?

  1. They comment on other people's posts.
  2. They like other people's posts.
  3. They share them.
  4. They don't always talk about themselves.
  5. They have kind words for other people.
item.source:markdown:
What do nice Internet users do?
1. They comment on other people's posts. 2. They like other people's posts. 3. They share them. 4. They don't always talk about themselves. 5. They have kind words for other people.

item.description: @om absolutely.
item.source:markdown: @om absolutely.

item.description:
Olbermann speaks the truth. What kind of reporter holds on to something like that so it can drive sales of her book. https://t.co/g5pdXnS8JR

Think about what @maggienyt did in terms of medicine.

A family member has a terrible disease. A cure is developed. Your doctor could get the medicine, but doing so would lose them money in the stock market, so they wait, and in the interim your relative suffers.

Unthinkable.
item.source:markdown:
Olbermann speaks the truth. What kind of reporter holds on to something like that so it can drive sales of her book. https://t.co/g5pdXnS8JR
Think about what @maggienyt did in terms of medicine.
A family member has a terrible disease. A cure is developed. Your doctor could get the medicine, but doing so would lose them money in the stock market, so they wait, and in the interim your relative suffers.
Unthinkable.

item.description: Btw, the legitimacy of the court has little to do with how the latest additions came about. It‚Äôs what they did. Imposing their personal values on 300 million Americans. They aren‚Äôt acting like umpires calling balls and strikes, rather they‚Äôre acting like very bad royalty.

item.description:
September 18, one week from today, is the 20 year anniversary of RSS 2.0.

That was when the arguing stopped, the format was supported by the NYT and then all the other pubs.

Then the feed business stabilized so it could grow, leading to lots of good stuff.

Next Sunday. üòÄ
item.source:markdown:
September 18, one week from today, is the 20 year anniversary of RSS 2.0.
That was when the arguing stopped, the format was supported by the NYT and then all the other pubs.
Then the feed business stabilized so it could grow, leading to lots of good stuff.
Next Sunday. üòÄ

item.description: @AnthonyMSG I think the players decided to help the fans re-accept him. They understand the humanity of the athletes. The fans abstract their humanity, objectify them to the nth degree.

item.description:
Trump is responsible for over a million American deaths. He knew how deadly the virus is, and did nothing to protect the country. Yes, he must be punished for trying to overthrow the government, but don't forget all the American death and suffering he's responsible for.

Today we commemorate a horrific event 21 years ago.

The pandemic is orders of magnitude more devastating than that event. And it's ongoing. It's still killing massive numbers of people and destroying lives.
item.source:markdown:
Trump is responsible for over a million American deaths. He knew how deadly the virus is, and did nothing to protect the country. Yes, he must be punished for trying to overthrow the government, but don't forget all the American death and suffering he's responsible for.
Today we commemorate a horrific event 21 years ago.
The pandemic is orders of magnitude more devastating than that event. And it's ongoing. It's still killing massive numbers of people and destroying lives.
